ModMetaData.name: [B19] Mass Graves
ModMetaData.author: NoImageAvailable
ModMetaData.description:
[B19]
Adds mass graves to allow easier disposing of raider corpses.
Original author is NoImageAvailable Some changes in code and update to B18 by Kartel' and update to B19 by Pyrce
[url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=33128.msg337601#msg337601]Non-steam official version[/url] (by NoImageAvailable) [url=https://github.com/MSeal/MassGraves/archive/master.zip]Non-steam B19 port[/url] (by Pyrce)
